title: TikTok Made Me Buy It
description:
For once we didn't get scammed?!
I Built A Laptop, Again: https://youtu.be/AKgL1v6wtfk
Apple Kills the Lightning Port: https://youtu.be/1uYsT8C3974
Wish.com for ALPHAS Only: https://youtu.be/yfeoywyBdkw
YouTube, Fix This: https://youtu.be/ZHgdxomXWOM
The WORST Xbox: https://youtu.be/AtgmhuBrJPY

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/thisis
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ThisIs_Channel
Matt: https://twitter.com/matt_ansini
Instagram: http://instagram.com/thisis_channel

Chapter Titles
-------------------------------
0:00 “Is this a bad idea?”
0:48 The TikTok Leggings (Sorry)
1:40 Official Ratings
2:11 It Shoot Milk
3:08 It Shoots
3:32 Unspilla-Bowl
4:48 Cheeto-Saver
6:03 Austin has a Moment
6:45 Then he gets Thirsty
7:47 “This is the Disaster Episode”
8:31 The Pink Stuff (Vegan)
9:25 Charmin Forever Roll
10:12 We Set The Mood
11:03 Austin Plays With Fire
12:05 Microphone (But Small)
12:40 Tiny Mic Sounds
13:14 Ice Roller
13:55 Cup and Blender
14:55 Light Up Your Smile
